INSERT INTO RECEIPT_APP ( RECEIPT_ID, RECEIPT_DATE, INFORMER_ID, INFORMER_NAME, COMMENT_TXT, AREA_CODE, REPORT_TYPE, PHONE_CELL, X_COORDINATE, Y_COORDINATE, ARTERY_NAME, FLAG_SITU_ED ) SELECT 'APP_' || #{phoneCell} || '_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') AS RECEIPT_ID, SYSDATE AS RECEIPT_DATE, i.INFORMER_ID AS INFORMER_ID,
#{informerName} AS INFORMER_NAME, #{commentTxt} AS COMMENT_TXT, #{areaCode} AS AREA_CODE, #{reportType} AS REPORT_TYPE, #{phoneCell} AS PHONE_CELL, #{xCoordinate} AS X_COORDINATE, #{yCoordinate} AS Y_COORDINATE, #{arteryName} AS ARTERY_NAME, 1 AS FLAG_SITU_ED FROM DUAL d LEFT JOIN INFORMER i ON ( i.PHONE_CELL = #{phoneCell} OR i.PHONE_HOME = #{phoneCell} OR i.PHONE_OFFICE = #{phoneCell}) AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.select: select BAS_NAME from code_report_type where bas_lcod=100 and bas_scod= #{reportType}

SELECT * FROM RECEIPT_APP
where RECEIPT_DATE >= SYSDATE - 30/(24*60) and flag_situ_ed=1
AND AREA_CODE = #{areaCode}
AND X_COORDINATE >= #{xCoordinate} - 0.01 AND X_COORDINATE <= #{xCoordinate} + 0.01 AND Y_COORDINATE >= #{yCoordinate} - 0.01 AND Y_COORDINATE <= #{yCoordinate} + 0.01

select receipt_id, receipt_date, informer_id, informer_name, comment_txt, area_code, report_type, phone_cell, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, flag_situ_ed from receipt_app where area_code=#{areaCode} and RECEIPT_DATE >= #{reqDate} and flag_situ_ed=1
union all
select receipt_id, to_date(to_char(receipt_day,'yyyymmdd')||replace(receipt_time,' ','')||'00','yyyymmddhh24miss') as receipt_date, individual_id as informer_id, individual_name as informer_name, memo as comment_txt, region_id as area_code, report_type, r_tel as phone_cell, x_coordinate, y_coordinate,
'1' as flag_situ_ed from report_receipt_today where region_id= #{areaCode} and receipt_day >= #{reqDate} and receipt_day <= sysdate
